name: ExcuseGenerator
tagline: hackRU Spring 2014 - Program using jQuery and underscore.js
body: A project for hackRU Spring 2014 done with ronakdpatel. By inputting the amount of time that you are late by, the program will display an excuse that is suitable for the amount of time that you provided.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
